lines.line: Hello. I Kangai Mau of the Rantuki tribe.
And what are you doing in Brimhaven?
I looking for someone brave to go on important mission for me. Someone skilled in thievery and sneaking about. I am told I can find such people in Brimhaven.
Tell me of this mission.
I need someone to go on a mission to the city of Ardougne. There you will find the house of Lord Handelmort. In his house he has our tribal totem.
We need it back.
Why does he have it?
Lord Handelmort is an Ardougnese explorer which means he think he have the right to come to my tribal home, steal our stuff and put in his private museum.
Ok, I will get it back.
Best of luck with that adventurer.
How can I find Handelmort's house? Ardougne is a big place...
I don't know Ardougne. You tell me.
Well good luck with that.
Let's hope I find some help soon.
I'm in search of adventure!
Adventure is something I may be able to give.
Who are the Rantuki tribe?
A proud and noble tribe of Karamja. But now we are few, as men come from across sea, steal our land, and settle on our hunting grounds.
It's a fine day to be out in the garden isn't it?
Yes, it's very nice.
Days like these make me glad to be alive!
So... who are you?
My name is Horacio Dobson. I'm the gardener to Lord Handelmort. Take a look around this beautiful garden, all of this is my handiwork.
So... do you garden round the back too?
That I do!
Doesn't all of the security around the house get in your way then?
Ah, I'm used to all that. I have my keys, the guard dogs know me, and I know the combination to the door lock. It's rather easy, it's his middle name.
Whose middle name?
Hum. I probably shouldn't have said that. Forget I mentioned it.
Do you need any help?
Trying to muscle in on my job eh? I'm more than happy to do this all by myself!
Welcome to GPDT!
Thank you very much.
Hello there. My name is Cromperty. I am a Wizard, and an inventor.
My good friend Sedridor has told me about you. As both wizard and inventor, he has aided me in my great invention!
So what have you invented?
Ah! My latest invention is my patent pending teleportation block! It emits a low level magical signal, that will allow me to locate it anywhere in the world, and teleport anything
directly to it! I hope to revolutionise the entire teleportation system! Don't you think I'm great? Uh, I mean it's great?
So where is the other block?
Well... Hmm. I would guess somewhere between here and the Wizards' Tower in Misthalin. All I know is that it hasn't got there yet as the wizards there would have contacted me.
I'm using the GPDT for delivery. They assured me it would be delivered promptly.
Who are the GPDT?
The Gielinor Parcel Delivery Team. They come very highly recommended. Their motto is: 'We aim to deliver your stuff at some point after you have paid us!'
Can I be teleported please?
By all means! I'm afraid I can't give you any specifics as to where you will come out however. Presumably wherever the other block is located.
Yes, that sounds good. Teleport me!
Okey dokey! Ready?
That sounds dangerous. Leave me here.
As you wish.
Well done, that's very clever.
Yes it is isn't it? Forgive me for feeling a little smug, this is a major breakthrough in the field of teleportation!
Now I just need someone to deliver it for me.
So, when are you going to deliver this crate?
Well... I guess we could do it now...
Thank you, it's interesting in here.
We're the premier delivery service in ALL of Gielinor!
Have you got our totem back?
No, it's not that easy.
Bah, you no good.
Yes I have.
You have??? Many thanks brave adventurer! Here, have some freshly cooked Karamjan fish, caught specially by my tribe.

characters.name: Kangai Mau
characters.description: Middle-aged male, African-accented English, speaks with broken grammar reflecting non-native speech, warm and earnest tone, a tribal leader from Karamja seeking help to recover his people's sacred totem.

characters.name: Horacio
characters.description: Middle-aged male, British working-class accent, friendly and cheerful gardener who takes pride in his work, slightly rotund and good-natured, accidentally reveals secrets when chatty.

characters.name: Wizard Cromperty
characters.description: Elderly male, British scholarly accent, enthusiastic and slightly eccentric inventor-wizard, prone to self-congratulation, helpful but frustrated with bureaucracy and postal services.

characters.name: GPDT employee
characters.description: Young adult male, British accent, lazy and unmotivated delivery worker, speaks in a casual dismissive manner, capable but prefers avoiding work until directly confronted.
